scan_id_instruction: To get started, we need to verify your identity. Please take a clear photo of both the front and back of your ID.
make_sure_clear_id: Make sure you’re in a well-lit area so your ID and face are clearly visible.
make_sure_easy_to_read: Make sure it’s easy to read!
place_front_id: Place Front Id inside the rectangle
place_back_id: Place Back Id inside the rectangle
processing_your_id: Processing your ID... This may take a moment.
unable_to_verify_id: Unable to verify the ID. Ensure it's clear and fully visible.
id_scanned_successfully: ID scanned successfully! Proceeding to the next step.
scan_face_instructions: You’ll be asked to do a random 3 out of these 5 fun movements
keep_your_camera_steady: Keep your camera steady to make sure the pictures come out sharp.
look_right: Turn face a bit to the right
look_left: Now, Turn face a bit to the left
face_scanned_successfully:
Face scanned successfully!
 You're all set.
unable_to_process_face: Unable to process. Ensure your face is within the frame.
